archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.2.14c: c) restrict the copying of sensitive files to only authorised removable media (e.g. based on file type, information classification or content, such as credit card numbers or social security numbers)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
